answers.answer: I am not familiar with these two brand names but as a general statement, the best way to assess blood glucose levels is by using a human glucometer and test strips and not checking the urine. Urine glucose levels fluctuate significantly and then as the urine collects and sits in the bladder, everything gets mixed together. So essentially the urine glucose level is like an average over many hours. Your vet can show you how to easily collect a drop of blood from your cat.

question: I saw there are quite a few tests to check the glucose at home for cats.  What is the difference between Glucotest and Pawcheck?  Is urine test reliable?
title: Diabetes test for my cat?
